title: How Wrestling Inspired Dying Light's Infamous Dropkick | Mini-Doc
description:
Dying Light's dropkick moves essentially breaks the game's combat, and the gaming community loves it. In the first episode of Snapshot we'll explore how that move came to be in the game.
